summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) voluntary interview waiver form, used to inform an employee of their rights and obtain their consent to participate in an interview as part of an OIG investigation. The specific subject of the investigation is not detailed in the provided text.

persons.name: General Special Agent
persons.context: Appears as the OIG agent conducting the interview, whose signature is on the form.

persons.name: Employee
persons.context: The individual requested to provide information voluntarily as part of an OIG investigation.

keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The employee is informed that the interview is voluntary, no disciplinary action will be taken for refusing to answer, but any statements may be used in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The specific subject of the OIG investigation is not stated in the provided text.
